Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tud.cs.se.ws15.kaesekaestchen_fancy_100_ex12.entity.Entity

  • public class Player
extends Entity
    This class is used to model both players who play the game.

              boolean human)

        Parameters:
        name - name of the player
        id - id of the player
        ai - used ai
        human - whether the player is human or ai

    • Method Detail

      • getStrId

        public String getStrId()
        This method is used to make it transparent which field belongs to whom on the map. This is necessary because the entered names of the players are to long to be displayed in the console and prefixes of the names of the players might be equal. "P1" is the Player who entered his name first, the other one will be represented by "P2".
        Returns:
        "P" + id
